blog.name: cyberpunk-thot
blog.title: Is NiCola ok Instead?
blog.description:
Dex || Gay || 25 || UK

Jackie Welles is my husband.

tags: like he’s gonna be a cool guy yeah
i actually really like the default V too!
im gonna wrote more fics too
summary: Ah! And forgot to mention about the fanfic! I didn’t even know there was fanfic for CP2077 already! I’m not much of a writer but...
question: Ah! And forgot to mention about the fanfic! I didn’t even know there was fanfic for CP2077 already! I’m not much of a writer but good job being a pioneer! And of course discussing headcanons is fun too! How is your V going to be like? Personally wise or lookwise! Any ideas? :D
answer:
I’m just inspired by the world of Cyberpunk 2077 and it’s characters so I love writing fiction for it. I also can’t wait to see what other people bring to the table.

As for my V, he is gonna be a dude, I like to make my characters look like me (is that weird?). I picture him being a cocky bastard, doesn’t know when to shut up and starts a lot of fights. But he’s loyal to his friends, always wants to have a good time and doesn’t let anything bring him down.

I have no idea what the character creation will look like but I would like V to have short to mid-length hair, maybe in a cool style. And surface wires and those glowing tattoos?! Sign me up.

And as for weapons? I like my characters to pretty much just head straight into the danger so I usually use a knife but this game looks like it will fuck me up with that approach so I’m gonna stock with pistols. Stealth? I don’t know her.

I want to draw him but I am still learning, maybe soon ;)

I want to draw him but I am still learning, maybe soon ;)

And as for weapons? I like my characters to pretty much just head straight into the danger so I usually use a knife but this game looks like it will fuck me up with that approach so I’m gonna stock with pistols. Stealth? I don’t know her.

blog.name: cyberpunk-thot
blog.title: Is NiCola ok Instead?
blog.description:
Dex || Gay || 25 || UK

Jackie Welles is my husband.

tags: but speculating is half the fun imo!
summary: Hey Anon from before!Really liked your answer! So, like you I’m a sucker for enemies to lovers or enemies>friends>lovers, bring...
question: Hey Anon from before!Really liked your answer! So, like you I’m a sucker for enemies to lovers or enemies>friends>lovers, bring it! I really liked the way you described a way a relationship with Jackie could start! I think he’d be sweet with V even tho he has that  “tough guy” look for everyone else. And as for Meredith, I don’t feel bad about it now, so thanks! Hahaha, and I totally want her to be our contact, but on the Male V gameplay she dies... But well it’s a work in progress so who knows!
answer:
From what I’ve gathered this game is going to have a lot of actions effected by our choices. Maybe if Meredith dies in one play through it might mean we can’t use her access in a latter mission? Things like that? I can’t wait and see, I will definitely have to play through several times to see what happens!

And you can bet that I’m gonna book the first week of work after the release date because why the heck not!
